original_text: After that, he built again the towns that King Hiram had given to him. He sent Israelites to live in them. Chronicles 7 Chronicles 9
korean_text: 후람이 솔로몬에게 되돌려 준 성읍들을 솔로몬이 건축하여 이스라엘 자손에게 거기에 거주하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: After that, he built again the towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 다시 그 도시들을 건설했습니다

sentences.original_text: that King Hiram had given to him
He sent Israelites to live in them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘 사람들을 그곳에 살도록 보냈습니다
